2306.11167.title: Large Language Models are Fixated by Red Herrings: Exploring Creative Problem Solving and Einstellung Effect using the Only Connect Wall Dataset
2306.11167.comments: v4,v3: Mincor cosmetic adjustments, typo-fixes etc. from V2. Fixed Fig. 2 caption overlapping with text in S2.2. V2: with added OCW-Randomized and OCW-WordNet results in Section 4.3 (added). 22 pages with Appendix
